name: To The Stars! (Vimlark)
description:
Made in 3 hours for the TriJam using GDevelop for first time!
Theme: Floating Islands

Click/Tap the island you want to move the player to. Every Gem collected will slightly increase your movement speed. How high of a score can you get!

This was my first time making a project with GDevelop and I'm super happy with the results. 

Art by: Kenney
